subject: Football
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Major League Baseball, the N.B.A. and the N.H.L. support the suspension of the Minnesota Vikings’ Kevin Williams and Pat Williams for violating the N.F.L.’s drug policy.
snippet: Major League Baseball, the N.B.A. and the N.H.L. support the suspension of the Minnesota Vikings’ Kevin Williams and Pat Williams for violating the N.F.L.’s drug policy.
